content: מה המזג האוויר למחר בכפר סבא?
מזג האוויר ב-Kfar Saba, Israel: 11.6°C, מעונן חלקית, רוח: 5.2 קמ"ש
מזג האוויר ב-London, United Kingdom: 7.6°C, מעונן, רוח: 7.4 קמ"ש

Well, if only choosing a candidate were as easy as fixing a data pipeline. Just like you wouldn't pick a schema without checking for mismatches, make sure you know their track record and data quality. But hey, it’s your vote, not a poorly designed ETL process. Good luck!

Fine, how about this: Why did the data engineer break up with the null value? Because it just couldn’t commit! Just like those late-night batch jobs that promise results but leave you with empty datasets. Classic.
Look, hey. What's up? Hopefully not another poorly documented API or a data pipeline full of null values. Let’s keep it efficient.
